action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enforcer makes three Dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Lightning Cage if available.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Lightning Cage {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 20-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on a point the enforcer can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Lightning damage, and the creature can't take Reactions until the end of the enforcer's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Temporal Disruption (1/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} The enforcer takes damage from a melee attack. {@actResponse} The enforcer teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Each creature within 10 feet of the space the enforcer left must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, or its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is halved until the start of the enforcer's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Misty Step (2/Day)
headerEntries: The enforcer casts {@spell Misty Step|XPHB}, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.
